recipe_name: Steamed mackerel with poached leeks in red wine
author: James Tanner
method: Bring a pan of water to the simmer and place a bamboo steamer on top. Arrange the lemon slices in the steamer and place the mackerel fillets inside. Season with salt and freshly ground black pepper.  Steam for 3-4 minutes, or until cooked. For the leeks, heat the red wine in a pan.  Add the leeks. Poach for 4-5 minutes, until tender. To serve, place the mackerel fillets on a serving plate and spoon the poached leeks alongside.
ingredients: 1 mackerel, cut into fillets,  ½ lemon, cut into slices,  salt and freshly ground black pepper,  150ml/5fl oz red wine,  150g/5¼oz  leeks, sliced
